alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 7:03PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Suwannee and northwestern Hamilton Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 703 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Madison to near Perry. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Live Oak, Jasper, Jennings, Suwannee River State Park, Dowling Park, Blue Springs, Crossroads, Luraville and Newburn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northern Florida...and southeastern Georgia.
